name: SCM – Smart Currency Manager

sections.description:
‚ùì Have you thought about letting your customers buy in your online shop using their own currency and payment method ‚ùì

‚ùì Have you thought about reaching out to as much customers as possible worldwideüåé, offering as much payment methods as possible, with no/cheapest fees for you and your customers‚ùì

‚ùì Have you thought about doing that and use it together with the #woocommercepaypalpayments plugin(https://woocommerce.com/document/woocommerce-paypal-payments/), which is simply by far the best PayPal plugin for #woocommerce‚ùì

‚ùì Have you thought about handling standard currencies, together with virtual currencies, crypto currencies, reward programs, points collection‚ùì

‚ùì Does PayPal isn‚Äôt working for your local currency and you want to use it anyways, or do you want to collect money to as much payment methods as possible, without having to be registered by each of them‚ùì

‚ùì Do you want to dramatically increase trust in all your payment methods and in the refund guarantee by your website visitors‚ùì

‚ùì Do you want to get control over the (daily) high fluctuations between the currencies involved within your business‚ùì

üëâ And much more‚Ä¶

üëâ This increases dramatically the probability of your customers making a purchase.

üëâ Over 92% of online customers prefer to buy using their own currencies, avoiding thereby hidden costs, being fully aware of the total price in their currency.

üëâ Over 95% of online customers prefer to buy using the payment methods of their trust, they feel safe about an eventual refund, the trusted payment method is almost always cheap, this combined with their own currency implies no additional costs.

üëâ This plugin addresses all this and more, is fully compatible with all #woocommerce plugins implemented standard conform, is compatible to more than 150 payment methods worldwide, give your sales a great boost, make additional incomes per unit of sale
Make use of our 24/7 support, start now!
PS a compatibility matrix(list of compatibilities) is also available within our website https://www.gajelabs.com under the ‚ÄúCompatibility‚Äù menu

üí± SCM ‚Äì Smart Currency Manager is a plugin that manages currency conversion in a very intelligent way. It is built for single-vendor sites as well as for marketplaces. It supports you throughout the end 2 end currencies conversion process: Hier some features, the full list is availabe under https://gajelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Documentation_scd_english_all_2021-updated.pdf

‚úÖ Optionally set a different price per each currency, or for some currencies, for each specific product.

‚úÖBest rates api, caching, city-level geolocalization.

‚úÖ Customization of the currencies : set manually the conversion rate compared to the base currency of the store, manage the fluctuations, choice of the currency symbol , choice of the price format.

‚úÖ Supports virtual currencies, cryptos, specific payment methods.

‚úÖ Support plugins for taxes, shipping, additional prices.

‚úÖ Several widget available with several configs.

‚úÖ When creating your pages with a page builder like elementor, you have the possibility to use a SCM shortcode to format all the prices you want to convert. The shortcode is the following
üëâ [scd_price amount=‚Äô7000‚Ä≤ from=‚Äô ‚Äò to=‚Äô ‚Äò]
üëâ The #amout# parameter allows you to set the amount
üëâ The #from# parameter allows you to set the base currency, by default when this is empty the currency is that of the woocommerce store.
üëâ The #to# parameter allows you to set the currency to which the conversion will be made, by default when this parameter is empty it will be converted to the local currency of the user or depending of the currency widget switching.

OUR DEFAULT SETTING DOESN‚ÄôT WORK FOR EVERYONE AND TALKING TO US SOLVES THE PROBLEM WITH 100% GUARANTEE!!!üëá

sections.faq:
✍ Is it mandatory to download the free version of SCM?

✔ Yes, it is mandatory to download the free version of SCM. In addition to the variant of our product that you purchased, you also need to download the free version. For example, a marketplace administrator who purchases scm for wc vendors must also download the free version of the product so that everything works. This also applies to other variants of our plugin Even the 14 day trial version works with the free version installed at the same time

✍ How do I contact the support team?

✔ You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com

✍How Can I Earn Money With Smart Currency Convertor (SCM)?

✔-First scenario : You can manually setup the exchange rate from one specific currency to another, and you can set up an additional percentage to tack on top of the conversion rate (add an extra 10% for example).

✔-second scenario : ‚ÄûSecond scenario: set up manually the products price for a specific currency. E.g. the product costs 20USD, as USD being your default currency, and you additionally, manually set it up for ‚Ç¨37‚Äú.

✍I am the admin of a marketplace.Can I get my commissions in the currency of my choice even if my sellers have received their payment in a currency different from mine?

✔The marketplace admin can decide the currency in which to receive their commissions, even if the seller displays their products in a different currency. In other words, the marketplace admin can receive their commissions in US dollars even if their sellers receive their sales in uk pounds.

✍What payment gateways is scm compatible with?

✔-Paypal Standard – Paypal Express Checkout – PayUMoney – PayUMoney Bolt -Stripe – cash on delivery -Payzen -Cardcom -Visa -Mastercard -Googlepay -Applepay -Bitcoin -Square -Payzen -Paystack -Mercadopago – Konnect – Flow.cl

✍Plugin doesn’t work with my theme ?

✔ We are not compatible with all the themes in wordpress, but with can provide custom implementation. You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com.

✍Your plugin doesn’t work well in my shop ?

✔ Check if you don’t have another conversion plugin or if or if it interferes with other site plugins or if you are using some plugin features that our plugin is not compatible to. You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com.

✍ I need a specific feature ?

✔ You can contact our support team by writing to us at support@gajelabs.com. we can explained more about our plugin features and provide custom implementations as needed.
